attributes.action: add an autobahn in the uk
attributes.additional_details: because 70mph speed limit boring might as well make a no speed limit motorway
attributes.background: Make a motorway without any speed limit like in Germany

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure if you want the Government to create a new motorway without speed limits, or to remove speed limits on an existing motorway.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Raise the UK Motorway Speed Limit to 80mph: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/640783
